column1: #Text=Bulk synthesis of the samples in the solid solution range\rof Mn1ô€€€xFexPSe3 (0 \ x \ 1, in increments of 0.125)\rwas carried out using traditional solid state synthesis.

#Text=Reagents of Mn (crushed granules, Alfa Aesar, 99.98%),\rFe (200 mesh, Alfa Aesar, 99%), P (red, powder, Sigma-\rAldrich, 99.99%), and Se (crushed granules, Alfa Aesar,\r99.999%) were ground together in an Ar-\flled glove box.

#Text=Precursors were loaded in 12 mm diameter fused sil-\rica tubes and sealed under vacuum using liquid nitrogen\rto prevent P and Se loss during vacuum sealing, and re-\racted at 650\C with a ramp rate of 10\C per minute and\r30 days hold time, followed by furnace cooling.
#Text=Heat-\ring at higher temperatures led to decomposition of the\rproduct, and no large crystals were obtained.
